description:
From time to time, incubi cross the portal between worlds to choose from among the hottest men on Earth who will be the next incubi king. To be the chosen one, Ciras' master starts to cheat the process and the demons appear before the expected date to investigate who would dare to interfere in the process. Will Ciras save his boss or will he tell the incubi the truth? Who will be the next chosen one?

My Incubi Harem is a visual novel about your quest to become the incubi king, featuring a manly mentor, a sultry singer, a queer dom activist, a cold-hearted nobleman and one sensible daddy. Navigate dialogue and make key decisions that lead to multiple possible endings, unlocking CG beautiful scenes along the way!

Features:

• Experience a fantasy tale about attractive men and incubi, with you at the center of it all!
• Make important decisions that directly impact the storyline.
• Explore multiple endings, including a secret one for completionists!
• Unlock beautifully illustrated CG scenes as the narrative unfolds.
• Enjoy dating sim elements and a memorable cast of manly companions!
name: My Incubi Harem
intro: Surround yourself with your love interests and claim the throne to have them all at your feet!
